sections.title: Business Model
paragraphs: The company generates revenue through a mix of product and service offerings across key segments.
Operational efficiency and capital intensity are reflected in the detailed tables below.

sections.title: Thesis
paragraphs: Our base case reflects durable growth and margins converging to stable levels consistent with long-run economics.
Valuation anchors on discounted FCFF and a conservative terminal construct.

sections.title: Risks
paragraphs: Key risks include execution against roadmap, pricing pressure, and macro sensitivity (rates, demand).
